description: "Big Eyes" was once a fisherman who made the mistake of eating mermaid`s flesh. Partially transformed into a lost soul, he attacked and killed his companions without knowing it. Seeing his twisted form in his reflection, he then realised what had happened and fled to the mountains. While still retaining the ability to speak and think (unusual for a lost soul), he periodically reverts back to a state of mindless violence.
name: Oomanako
